description: Tisza community-led demonstration project for sustainable development and integrated land and water management

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The Tisza community-led demonstration project for sustainable development and integrated land and water management is an integral part of the GEF- Mid-Size Project “Establishment of Mechanisms for Integrated Land and Water Management in the Tisza River Basin”. This pilot and demonstration component will aim at developing, implementation and evaluation of a transboundary community-led projects that promote sustainable development through integrated land and water management practices at the community level.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Tisa community-led demo

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description: The Tisza community-led demonstration project for sustainable development and integrated land and water management is an integral part of the GEF- Mid-Size Project “Establishment of Mechanisms for Integrated Land and Water Management in the Tisza River Basin”.
